bibl.title: Reconstructing (again) the Opening of the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Derveni (= M.-P.3 2465.1; LDAB 7049). - [Introduction.] - 1. New Joins in Columns 6-7. - 2. The Reconstruction of Columns 1-3. - 3. New Proposals Regarding Columns 4-5. - 4. Summary and Conclusion.
